org.ardenus.graphics

Class Glyph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.Glyph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class Glyph
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable
    Represents a glyph that can be used to draw text to the screen.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

        public void draw(java.lang.String text,

                 float fontSize,
                 java.awt.Color color,
                 float alpha,
                 boolean billboard)
        Draws the specified text to the screen.
        Parameters:
        text. - the text to render.
        x - the X position.
        y - the Y position.
        fontSize - the fontSize of the text.
        color - the color of the text.
        alpha - the alpha of the text.
        billboard - true if the text should be drawn as a billboard, false otherwise.
